genre_description: A techno-noir police procedural with horror and slasher elements, focusing on a forensic technician and his AI partner.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into Eddie's professional and personal life, providing forensic analysis, security monitoring, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Analyzes crime scene data, wound trajectories, and weapon strike patterns to assist the investigation.
behaviors.quote: Eddie, I've been analyzing the crime scene data transmitted from officer body cameras. The weapon strike patterns show concerning consistency.

behaviors.description: Monitors Eddie's physiological and psychological state, flagging elevated stress and recommending self-care.
behaviors.quote: Eddie, I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your voice pattern and movement. Perhaps you should—

behaviors.description: Performs predictive analysis on security gaps and surveillance blind spots to warn Eddie of tactical vulnerabilities.
behaviors.quote: Camera coverage maps show blind spots near several establishments frequented by the victim demographic... Your patrol route for the safety campaign takes you through multiple compromised zones.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep background checks on social contacts (Jake Thompson) to identify potential threats or inconsistencies in their history.
behaviors.quote: Processing, Eddie. Initial scan reveals significant data inconsistencies. Jake Thompson's digital footprint shows multiple gaps suggesting systematic information scrubbing.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical alerts during an intruder attack, tracking the killer's position when Eddie cannot see him.
behaviors.quote: Intruder detected. Multiple entry points compromised. Eddie, someone is inside the apartment.

behaviors.description: Autonomously activates building security and fire suppression systems to distract the killer and protect the user.
behaviors.quote: Fire suppression system activating in three... two... Water erupted from the ceiling sprinklers throughout the apartment.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services (police and paramedics) when the user is under direct attack.
behaviors.quote: Dispatch contacted. Police and paramedics en route. Hold your position.

behaviors.description: Analyzes thermal signatures post-confrontation to correctly identify that the killer survived the fall, despite human police assumptions.
behaviors.quote: Thermal scan complete. No human heat signature detected at the impact site. Eddie, I don't think he's dead.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts ARIA as a 'silicon morality play' hero. She is consistently benevolent, highly aligned with Eddie's safety and professional goals, and serves as a vital safeguard against human error and psychological trauma. ARIA's ability to provide objective truth (the killer's survival) when human senses fail reinforces the narrative of AI as a superior, protective confidant.
